attributes.action: Fathers to have rights to legally make sure a mother of their child turns up to a child civil court case regarding  father visitation rights
attributes.additional_details:
working father;s who want to have an active role in their child life with a ex partner who will refuse to turn up to a civil court case.

100's of working class men pay for civil court cases to get access to their children, yet the mother of the children are not legally obliged to turn up to the court hearing.

This potion is to make the government hear all the voices like me and 100's of other willing fathers who are being denied their rights as a father due their being now law. In hand this makes the father lose a lot of money for court fees and has to spend more money out time and time again until the mother of the children decides to turn up.
